To evaluate the accuracy of solutions, we report unit-free Euler equation errors on a simulation of 10,000 observations. To approximate integrals in our accuracy checks, we use a monomial integration rule with 2ÃÂ¯2 + 1 nodes as in Judd et al. (2011).
